channel.title: Simple "cannot find symbol" errors
channel.description:
I have imported everything that needs to be. Still no cookie. Any help is appreciated.
[code]src\engine\util\HiscoresHandler.java:11: error: cannot find symbol public static Statement stm; ^ symbol: class Statement location: class HiscoresHandler src\engine\util\HiscoresHandler.java:33: error: cannot find symbol public static ResultSet query(String s) ^ symbol: class ResultSet location: class HiscoresHandler src\engine\util\HiscoresHandler.java:67: error: cannot find symbol public static boolean save(Client c) { ^ symbol: class Client location: class HiscoresHandler src\game\Server.java:135: error: cannot find symbol Highscores.process(); ^ symbol: variable Highscores location: class Server src\game\Server.java:136: error: cannot find symbol if (Highscores.connected) { ^ symbol: variable Highscores location: class Server src\game\player\Player.java:3082: error: cannot find symbol Highscores.save(this); ^ symbol: variable Highscores location: class Player src\game\player\Player.java:3111: error: cannot find symbol Highscores.save(this); ^ symbol: variable Highscores location: class Player src\engine\util\HiscoresHandler.java:38: error: cannot find symbol ResultSet resultset = stm.executeQuery(s); ^ symbol: class ResultSet location: class HiscoresHandler 8 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Simple "cannot find symbol" errors
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make sure you’re importing the sql classes…

import java.sql.*;
